org.zalando.problem.spring.web.advice.validation.ValidationAdviceTrait
    @ControllerAdvice
public class ExceptionTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.zalando.problem.spring.web.advice.ProblemHandling, org.zalando.problem.spring.web.advice.security.SecurityAdviceTrait
    Controller advice to translate the server side exceptions to client-friendly json structures. The error response follows RFC7807 - Problem Details for HTTP APIs (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807).
